1.content:
Knuckles sat next to the Master Emerald as he imagined the state the world was in around him as he knew if things kept going the way they have the Master Emerald could be left defenseless as the Echidna race would die out, he had to do something and figure out that something soon as Tikal appeared from the Master Emerald as if she seemingly heard his thoughts. “I am sure you have been thinking about the situation we have before us and we cannot let it come to pass, I have a way to solve this however I didn’t want to resort to it.” Knuckles raised a brow in confusion as Tikal pointed to the bottom of the shrine as a portion of the ground rose to reveal a hidden passageway Knuckles ran inside of with Tikal right behind him.

Inside was dark and a bit eerie however Tikal’s current form glowed providing Knuckles enough light to see ahead of him when he found the end of the path with a strange relic on a pedestal that was the size of a small trophy with the top in the shape of an Echidna head. “This was a tool my father made in order to expand the size of the Echidna empire, it used the power of the Master Emerald to transform captured beings into loyal Echidna foot soldiers. The Guardian was shocked at what he heard as he turned to look at Tikal, “Are you suggesting that use this to forcefully transform people?!” His ancestor would nod showing a strong look of sadness on her face, “I said it was something I wanted to avoid using for a reason but we are being left with seemingly no other choice just be careful as I believe this tool can corrupt the user my father was a surprisingly kind individual who only used it originally to have enough people to protect our homeland so we could live peacefully but he grew to want more and more taking over and converting many other civilizations over time I may have been unable to help him but I can certainly do whatever possible to keep you from becoming a monster.” Knuckles sighed as she was likely right and he was happy that he had someone looking over his shoulder to keep him in line but he still wasn’t completely comfortable with the idea as he grabbed the statue and left the underground area just to see it close back up upon leaving. “I guess I should start recruiting...”

11342122431322113134124223231114142.content:
Tikal and Shade carefully made their way over to Finitevus’ hideout but that was very difficult considering how many echidnas were patrolling the area as not only was pretty much anyone in the Mystic Ruins area turned at this point but it seemed Lien-Da called up the Dark Egg Legion and brought up into the fold as well. “I don’t believe we can get inside without being noticed.” Shade notes with disappointment in her voice as she could see no other entrees to the place besides the front door which had ten different Echidna surrounding it but just before the two women went to attack Shade’s communicator was going off as a transmission was coming from...the Sky Patrol.

“Well Tails great timing as we have a situation in the Mystic Ruins.” It seems Tails was on the other end in most cases Tikal would be happy for that however she noticed his eyes weren’t glazed or foggy. “Oh I’m aware something was happening there as I saw Knuckles using a device to hypnotize people and transform them into echidnas which confused me until I noticed Lien-Da was with him which lead me to believe she is somehow controlling him, he managed to zap me and Big with his tool wanting us to be moles within the Freedom Fighters instead of outright changing us but along the way back the Chaos Emerald somehow brought me to my senses and I used it to restore Big too, I just recently got back to the team and we were planning on making our way there but called as many as we could in the area to see if anyone managed to stay safe as well as have information on the situation in case it changed but it seems you two are the only ones left.” Shade explained what Tikal had stated and sent Tails pictures of how the enemy was controlling security.

“Alright the Freedom Fighters are almost there once we arrive we’ll cause a commotion to get the attention of as many of those echidnas as possible and once the coast is clear enough you two go in and try to free everyone from Finitevus but it’ll be dangerous so be careful.” Tikal and Shade were very aware as they signed off and waited for the plan to commence.

155.title: Something else

info.brief_description: With the Echidna race nearly wiped out Knuckles takes drastic measures to save it
info.description:
In this story Knuckles will do whatever it takes to save his race which includes mind control and transformations, bare in mind in some canons (SatAm/Archie and Sonic Chronicles Dark Brotherhood) Knuckles isn’t the last Echidna but after the a certain Tasmanian Devil did even Archie canon was pretty low on Echidnas before the wave hit and left only Knuckles left so we roll with the premise with so little of them left he decides to enact this plan.

Rules:

No vore or unbirthing

No diaper stuff, watersports, fart fetish, foot fetish, gigantification, shrinking fetish, etc.

Knuckles will be transforming many into Echidna who aren’t already so bare that in mind when transforming characters

No killing

Knuckles is the main character so it should primarily follow him, only follow someone else for a temporary amount of time before going back to him

Sex is allowed but put a detailed warning at the start of a chapter that contains it

No OC/FCs

Knuckles is straight bare in mind he could keep or turn others into males so not every new Echidna would be a relative to him

With that all in mind I look forward to writing chapters on this story with you all and let’s have fun!
